s0680.chinese: 始皇帝五十一年而崩，子胡亥立，是為二世皇帝。
s0680.literal: First Emperor fifty-first year died, son Huhai ascended, this was Second Generation Emperor.
s0680.idiomatic: First Emperor fifty-first year died, son Huhai ascended, this was Second Generation Emperor.

s0681.chinese: 三年，諸侯并起叛秦，趙高殺二世，立子嬰。
s0681.literal: Third year, lords all rose up to rebel against Qin, Zhao Gao killed Second Generation, established Ziying.
s0681.idiomatic: Third year, lords all rose up to rebel against Qin, Zhao Gao killed Second Generation, established Ziying.

s0682.chinese: 子嬰立月餘，諸侯誅之，遂滅秦。
s0682.literal: Ziying ascended over a month, lords executed him, thus extinguished Qin.
s0682.idiomatic: Ziying ascended over a month, lords executed him, thus extinguished Qin.

s0683.literal: The account is in the First Emperor's annals.
s0683.idiomatic: The account is in the First Emperor's annals.

s0684.chinese: 太史公曰：秦之先為嬴姓。
s0684.literal: Grand Historian says: Qin's ancestors were of Ying surname.
s0684.idiomatic: Grand Historian says: Qin's ancestors were of Ying surname.

s0685.chinese: 其後分封，以國為姓，有徐氏、郯氏、莒氏、終黎氏、運奄氏、菟裘氏、將梁氏、黃氏、江氏、修魚氏、白冥氏、蜚廉氏、秦氏。
s0685.literal: Later divided and enfeoffed, took state names as surnames, had Xu clan, Tan clan, Ju clan, Zhongli clan, Yunyan clan, Tuqiu clan, Jiangliang clan, Huang clan, Jiang clan, Xiuyu clan, Baiming clan, Feilian clan, Qin clan.
s0685.idiomatic: Later divided and enfeoffed, took state names as surnames, had Xu clan, Tan clan, Ju clan, Zhongli clan, Yunyan clan, Tuqiu clan, Jiangliang clan, Huang clan, Jiang clan, Xiuyu clan, Baiming clan, Feilian clan, Qin clan.

s0686.chinese: 然秦以其先造父封趙城，為趙氏。
s0686.literal: However, Qin because their ancestor Zaofu was enfeoffed at Zhao city, became the Zhao clan.
s0686.idiomatic: However, Qin because their ancestor Zaofu was enfeoffed at Zhao city, became the Zhao clan.
